team27.healthe.controllers

Class ImageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • team27.healthe.controllers.ImageController

  • public class ImageController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls operations for loading/storing of images associated with a user
    Author:
    Chris

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ImageController.getUserAsync
      Async class for getting user from elastic search server -refreshes users associated image list -notifies image adapter that changes have been made

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageController(android.content.Context c, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new directory in the app's default picture directory with folder name: 'name' and creates an empty list for holding filepaths for associated images
